document.full_text: a series of court decisions that briefly opened the n.f.l. for business, then abruptly closed it, have plunged undrafted free agents into the most acute limbo of an uncertain off-season.
document.title: undrafted are trapped in lockout netherworld
lines_and_colors: a series of court decisions that briefly opened the n.f.l. for business, then abruptly closed it, have plunged undrafted free agents into the most acute limbo of an uncertain off-season.
